mapper.select: select distinct mname, GENRE as m_genre from( select t.mname, i.genre, t.day from timetable t inner join indemovie i on t.mname = i.title) where day = #{day}
select theater.t_region from theater inner join timetable on t_theater = theater where timetable.mname = #{mname} group by theater.t_region
select distinct t.t_theater from theater t inner join timetable on t.t_theater = theater where t.t_region = #{selectRg} and mname = #{mname}

select * from (select distinct x.cinema, x.num, x.theater, to_char(x.mstart,'HH24:mi') as mstart, to_char(x.mend,'HH24:mi') as mend, x.mname, to_char(x.day,'yyyy-MM-dd') as day, y.m_genre, y.m_runtime, y.m_grade, to_char(y.m_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as m_date, y.m_enddate as m_Enddate, z.t_seat, z.t_premium, x.bookingseat from timetable x, movie y, theater z where x.mname = y.m_name and x.theater = z.t_theater and x.cinema = z.t_name ) where theater =#{theater} and day =#{day} and mname = #{mname} and day >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and mstart > to_char(sysdate,'HH24:Mi')

select * from ( select distinct x.cinema, x.num, x.theater, to_char(x.mstart,'HH24:mi') as mstart, to_char(x.mend,'HH24:mi') as mend, x.mname, to_char(x.day,'yyyy-MM-dd') as day, i.genre, i.runtime, z.t_seat, z.t_premium, x.bookingseat from timetable x, indemovie i, theater z where x.mname = i.title and x.theater = z.t_theater and x.cinema = z.t_name ) where theater =#{theater} and day =#{day} and mname = #{mname} and day >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') and mstart > to_char(sysdate,'HH24:Mi')

select distinct b.r_num, b.r_userId, b.r_price, b.r_reserDay, b.r_mname, b.r_theater, b.r_cinema, b.r_day, b.r_mstart, b.r_sno, b.r_paying, m.m_num, m.m_img as r_img from book b, movie m, member i where b.r_userId = #{userId} and m.m_name = b.r_mname order by b.r_num desc

select distinct b.r_num, b.r_userId, b.r_price, b.r_reserDay, b.r_mname, b.r_theater, b.r_cinema, b.r_day, b.r_mstart, b.r_sno, b.r_paying, m.num, m.img as r_img from book b, indemovie m, member i where b.r_userId = #{userId} and m.title = b.r_mname order by b.r_num desc
mapper.delete: delete from myticket where t_id=#{t_id} and t_order=0
mapper.select: select distinct num from( select t.num, t.mname, t.theater, t.cinema, t.day, t.mstart from book b, timetable t where b.r_mname = t.mname and b.r_theater = t.theater and b.r_cinema = t.cinema and b.r_day = t.day) where theater = #{r_theater} and cinema=#{r_cinema} and day = #{r_day} and mname = #{r_mname}
